I on the other hand will NEVER give up.  Although I
wish Tankor would post for Cheetah, or whoever has him
for Megatron.

--- Hollywood Narrator <thecode@...> wrote:
> And so, realizing that he has failed to make a
> successful comeback in NBW, the Hollywood Narrator
> decides that retirement might be the best solution.
> He has no regrets, other than that he just couldn't
> hold onto his spot in the NBW like he wanted to. His
> posts, this one included, have lost all of their
> life and energy. He degenerates rapidly, and
> although he is not a bad RPer, like he once was, he
> feels that he is not up to par with alot of other
> people. He is clueless, he does not know what is
> going on with the RPG and does not know what to do
> with his characters. He feels he had a pretty good
> run, and at one point was almost on top. He had
> nearly the greatest number of all time characters in
> the RPG's history, and his characters actually,
> although through gan grape (Get it?), destroyed one
> of the Predacon bases. He has not always been easy
> to work with. He's complained, he's challenged
> things, he's argued with the highest of people,
> because he worked hard to protect what he had
> already established. But now, nobody misses the
> Hollywood Narrator's posts. Nobody is interested in
> trying to do storylines with the aging veteran.
> Before the character limit, he was promising. After
> the limit happened, he just seemed to float off into
> space, not able to have fun with his limited cast.
> Should the Hollywood Narrator leave? Maybe that
> should be for the RPG to decide. I am in a sad state
> with NBW right now...
>
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> New, New, New World Order! 4 life! 4 life!
> 
> Watcha gonna do when HulkaMania runs wild on you!?
